statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM water_usage_data WHERE garden_zone_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, water_flow_rate FROM water_usage_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE garden_zone_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, garden_zone_id FROM water_usage_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(water_flow_rate) AS max_flow_rate FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT garden_zone_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY garden_zone_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT AVG(water_flow_rate) AS avg_flow_rate, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS num_users FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT id, liters_used, date FROM water_usage_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE liters_used > 100 ORDER BY liters_used DESC;
SELECT id, SUM(liters_used) AS total_liters FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY id HAVING total_liters > 500;
SELECT device_name, garden_area FROM garden_devices WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT id, date, liters_used FROM water_usage_data WHERE liters_used > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, garden_area FROM garden_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT id, date, liters_used FROM water_usage_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, date, liters_used FROM water_usage_data WHERE liters_used < 50 AND date > '2022-02-15' ORDER BY liters_used ASC
SELECT device_name, garden_area FROM garden_devices WHERE garden_area >= 100 ORDER BY device_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM water_usage_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, water_usage FROM water_usage_logs WHERE device_id = 'abcde-12345' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE zone_id = 'xyz-987' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_zones WHERE plant_type = 'flowers' AND zone_type = 'drip' ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT id, zone_name FROM irrigation_zones WHERE zone_type = 'sprinkler';
SELECT * FROM water_usage_logs WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT w.timestamp, w.water_usage, d.device_name, z.zone_name FROM water_usage_logs w INNER JOIN devices d ON w.device_id = d.id INNER JOIN irrigation_zones z ON d.zone_id = z.id WHERE z.plant_type = 'vegetables' ORDER BY w.timestamp ASC;

SELECT d.device_name, z.zone_name, COUNT(w.id) AS total_logs FROM devices d INNER JOIN irrigation_zones z ON d.zone_id = z.id LEFT JOIN water_usage_logs w ON d.id = w.device_id GROUP BY d.device_name, z.zone_name ORDER BY total_logs DESC;

SELECT z.zone_name, AVG(w.water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM water_usage_logs w INNER JOIN devices d ON w.device_id = d.id INNER JOIN irrigation_zones z ON d.zone_id = z.id WHERE w.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY z.zone_name;
SELECT d.device_name, SUM(w.water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM water_usage_logs w INNER JOIN devices d ON w.device_id = d.id GROUP BY d.device_name HAVING total_water_usage > 500;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption;
SELECT timestamp, device_id, amount FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM GardenDevices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, area_size FROM GardenAreas WHERE area_size > 100 ORDER BY area_size DESC;
SELECT event_type, duration, timestamp FROM IrrigationEvents WHERE duration < 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM WaterConsumption GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT GC.device_name, GA.area_name, SUM(WC.amount) AS total_amount FROM GardenDevices GC JOIN GardenAreas GA ON GC.device_id = GA.area_id JOIN WaterConsumption WC ON GC.device_id = WC.device_id GROUP BY GC.device_name, GA.area_name;
SELECT IE.event_type, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM IrrigationEvents IE GROUP BY IE.event_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT GA.area_name, AVG(area_size) AS avg_area_size FROM GardenAreas GA GROUP BY GA.area_name ORDER BY avg_area_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM GardenLocations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM GardenLocations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, measurement_date, moisture_level FROM SoilMoisture WHERE moisture_level > 3.0 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, location_id, forecast_date, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature < 25.0 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, location_id, start_time, end_time, days_of_week FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM GardenLocations;
SELECT location_name, location_id FROM GardenLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE amount_used > 100;
SELECT location_name, measurement_date, moisture_level FROM GardenLocations JOIN SoilMoisture ON GardenLocations.location_id = SoilMoisture.location_id;
SELECT location_name, forecast_date, temperature, precipitation FROM GardenLocations JOIN WeatherForecast ON GardenLocations.location_id = WeatherForecast.location_id WHERE temperature > 25;
